question_text: Which of the following are security considerations for managing SIM and eSIM profiles? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Unauthorized profile switching can affect billing and tracking
SIM IDs must be validated by the carrier before activation
eSIM profiles are encrypted and require authentication to modify
Physical SIMs are less secure than eSIMs due to remote management limitations
correct_answer: Unauthorized profile switching can affect billing and tracking
SIM IDs must be validated by the carrier before activation
eSIM profiles are encrypted and require authentication to modify
Physical SIMs are less secure than eSIMs due to remote management limitations
explanation: SIM and eSIM profiles both involve sensitive identity data. Carriers validate SIM IDs, and eSIMs offer more secure, centrally managed control.
